name: Desperado
description:
An arcade game about survive while killing space frogs.

My record is 1096 frogs, share your records in the comments ;)

Advices and tips:

-While you are shooting you go slower.

 -My best tactic is defend the screen, keep the position, not running (ツ)_/¯ (is just my way to play try to pass my record using the strategy you want)

MUSICA CREADA POR Tai Callies
